channel.title: Legends Quest (Incomplete for now)
channel.description:
-------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------QUEST ID(50)LEGENDS QUEST----------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------
Quest Start: Sir Radimus Erkle
NPC IDs: http://pastebin.com/HJMTw9Tf
ITEM IDs: http://pastebin.com/x2fHRL9s
OBJect IDs: http://pastebin.com/WMp62Prw
Wall Object IDs: http://pastebin.com/h7TgLnB6
::Stores::: Jiminua's Jungle Store(coords: 459,754) items sold ----------------- TODO
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::NPC QUEST STAGES::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Legends Guild Guard: 1)Talk to Legends guild guard, IF "not eligible"(Stage 0) --------------------- TODO 1.5)Talk to Legends guild guard, IF "Eligible"(Stage 1)------------------------- http://pastebin.com/e0iMS4DX 2)Talk to Legends Guild guard, If you start quest(Stage 2)-------------------- http://pastebin.com/0UcfUL4Q 3)Talk to Legends Guild guard, if you complete quest(Stage 3)--------------- TODO
Sir Radimus Erkle: 1)Talk to Sir Radimus Erkle: To Begin Quest (Stage 0)----------------------- http://pastebin.com/wKZCiLCV 2) Retalking to Sir Radimus Erkle (Stage 1)------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/82wsj6Z4 2)using the totem pole(the one you crafted) on sir erkle(Stage 2)--------------------- http://pastebin.com/veMtqmye 3)using radimus scrolls (completed) on Sir Radimus Erkle BEFORE you get the glided totem pole(Stage 3)-- http://pastebin.com/j4FMMQMA 4)using radimus scrolls (completed) on Sir Radimus Erkle AFTER you get the glided totem pole(Stage 4)--- TODO 3.5)using incomplete radimus scroll on Sir Radimus Erkle------------------------------------------------- TODO 4)Using Guilded totem pole on Sir Erkle---------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/bJpTN518 5) Retalking to Sir erkle after he tells you to go inside legends guild to meet him------------------ http://pastebin.com/Y5yiQzLz 6)Talk to Sir Radimus Erkle: Talking to Sir Radimus Erkle inside the Legends Hall for reward-------- http://pastebin.com/9HvwQqqs 7)IF you choose a skill then------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qYami5Sx 8)If u choose a skill and then u decide you dont want to train any xp --------------------------- TODO 7)Talk to Sir Radimus Erkle: Retalking to Sir Erkle final------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/kPGnNgkb
Jungle Forester: 1)Talk to Jungle Forester Stage before quest(0)------------------------------- TODO 2)Talk to Jungle Forester after starting Legends quest Stage(1)------------- http://pastebin.com/hSvew93u 3)Retalking to Jungle Forester (Stage(2)----------------------------------------- TODO 4)USING: the Completed Radimus scrolls on the Jungle Forester (Stage 3)- http://pastebin.com/DwZ2Pgbt 5)Talking To Jungle Forester After you complete quest (Stage 4)------------- TODO
Gujuo: 1)Talk to Gujuo swinging bullroarer for the first time(Stage 0)---------------- http://pastebin.com/6Y5EG9AC 2)Retalking to Gujuo after speaking with Ungudulu+ reading notes (Missing 1 option)(Stage 1)-- http://pastebin.com/ypRre9xh 3)Talking to Gujuo after making golden bowl(missing 1 option)(Stage 2)------------------------ http://pastebin.com/XMuPSbLQ 4)Talking to Gujuo after you search the crude desk(Stage 3)----------------- ---------------- TODO 5)going back to Gujuo before you go to fight the demon(Stage 4)------------------------------ TODO 6)after killing Nezikchened and talking to Ungadulu and recieving yommi tree seeds(Stage 5)------- http://pastebin.com/MX7cF3jd 7)Talking to Gujuo about the murky water(Stage 6)---------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/9e4ZhZ1E 8)Asking Gujuo about the disgusting shallow pool and why its dried up and you cant get pure water from it(Stage 7)--- http://pastebin.com/w93JY0By 9)Going to Gujuo with dark dagger from the Erkin Zhekin------------------------------------------ TODO 10)Going to Gujuo with glowing dark dagger from Erkin Zhekin ------------------------------------ TODO 11)Talking to Gujuo after defeating Erkin Zhekin and crafting the totem pole----------------------- http://pastebin.com/ZaUPacWi 12)Talking to Gujuo after replacing the evil pole------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/bLN8QZn1
Ungadulu: 2)Talking to ungadulu inside the flame wall(Stage 1)--------------------------- http://pastebin.com/svRJPzB2 2.5)Simply trying to attack ungadulu "before" you use book of binding on him--- TODO 3)Using Book of Binding on him(Stage 2)----------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/cMWFn2jb 4)Talking to him with yommi seeds already in inventory(Stage 3)------------------ http://pastebin.com/pvbaT7rJ 5)Going to Ungadulu with dark dagger from the Erkin Zhekin (Stage 4)-------------- TODO 6)Going to Ungadulu with glowing dark dagger and "talking outside" the flamewall after u killed Vivyeldi(Stage 5)- http://pastebin.com/BUBSzapk 7)Using magic fire pass to go to ungadulu and then using on him the glowing dark dagger:------------ http://pastebin.com/GRT4PXJj 8)Using dark dagger on Ungadulu )Talking to ungadulu after defeating Erkin Zhekin BEFORE you make totem pole---------------------- TODO 9)Talking to Ungadulu after defeating Erkin Zhekin and you already made totem pole----------------- http://pastebin.com/3uSerwDJ )Losing all your shit (If you die) and talking to Ungadulu------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/G3bhKBJK 12)Talking to ungadulu after gujuo gives you glided totem pole------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/KPJkMzs5
fighting: San Tojalon(in the legends cave)---------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/zXsddZ4Q
fighting: Irvig Senay(in the legends cave)---------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/kDc1RGMd
fighting: Ranalph Devere(in the legends cave)------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/ZWjAdkMt
Echned Zekin: 1)Moving boulder(Stage 0)---------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/VQ6mx5jV 2)Retalking to Echned Zekin: task chosen to kill Viyeldi------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ZVYnms9d 3)Returning to Echned Zekin after you killed Vivyeldi--------------------------------- TODO 4)Returning to Echned Zekin after giving the dagger to Ungadulu---------------------- http://pastebin.com/3e2rK2wB 5)Using: holy force spell on Echned Zekin------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/izgQVT2z 6)Coming close to defeating Nezikchened------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/xGc99xRc
:::::OBJECT OPTIONS> USE ITEM ON INVENTORY> USE ITEM ON OBJECT> SEARCH OPTIONS:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Wrought Mithril Gates: 1)Attempting to enter gate without starting quest (Stage 0)--------------------- TODO 2)Attempting to enter gate after you start quest (Stage 1)---------------------- TODO 3)Attempting to enter gate after completing quest (Stage 2)--------------------- TODO
Attempting to "open" Sir Erkles cupboard: 1)Stage before you start quest(0)------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/WgEr29VL 2)Taking the machete from the cupboard Stage (1) -------------------------------- TODO 3)Complete quest Stage (2)--------------------- --------------------------------- TODO
Legends Hall Doors: 1)Attempting to enter door before/during quest: (Stage 0)-------------------- http://pastebin.com/ZLe8xzJf 2)Attempting to enter door after completing quest: (Stage 1)---------------- http://pastebin.com/Z5DW8bgt
Reading Radimus Scrolls: 1)Reading Radimus Scrolls incomplete map "outside" of Jungle ---------------------------- http://pastebin.com/7n6FUKn7 2)Reading Radimus Scrolls: if Success: Mapping the middle part of Jungle-- http://pastebin.com/LFatScC0 3)Reading Radimus Scrolls: if Success: Mapping the western part of Jungle-- http://pastebin.com/zEdpdfEv 4)Reading Radimus Scrolls: if Success: Mapping the eastern part of Jungle-- http://pastebin.com/pcYYRe2H 5)Radimus scrolls "success to all 3 sections" then ------------------------ http://pastebin.com/AykCxzF0 6)Fail to map a new section ----------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ru8wQyM2 6.5) IF you have no charcoal or papyrus to map----------------------------- TODO 7)Reading Complete Map ----------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/4ZArwvha 6)Reading the completed map outside the jungle------------------------------ TODO
Investigating water: 1)water is fine:(Stage 0)----------------------------------------- SendMessage("A bubbling brook with effervescent water..."); 2)pool turns to crap after you germinate yommi tree seeds Stage(1)-- SendMessage("A disgusting sess pit of filth and stench..."); 3)Re-investigating after u try and use the cut reed plant on shallow water Stage(2)---- http://pastebin.com/sPGRi60i 4)After defeating the spirit down in legends dungeon Stage(3)------ SendMessage("A bubbling brook with effervescent water...");
search rock coords: 452,872(access to underground cave) : 1)BEFORE you have mapped the jungle(Stage 0)---- SendMessage("You see nothing significant."); 2)After you have mapped the entire jungle and talked to Gujuo about Ungadulu(Stage 1)-- http://pastebin.com/iWtfWMwk
Swinging The Bullroarer: 1)swinging bullroarer "outside" Kharazi Jungle---------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/WfSQQnSb 1.5)swinging bullroarer near jungle forester------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/LsRRCRee 2)swinging bullroarer and nothing happens -------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/YAfaj3Es 3)swinging bullroarer and npc attacks--------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/hxkqrFKy 4)Swinging bullroarer and gujuo appears (see Gujuo below)
Flamewall: 1) Touch------------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/q7JiCtXq 2) Investigate----------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ViS0N6Jy 3) using blessed bowl with pure water on flamewall--------------------------- http://pastebin.com/tPDeA7Jm 4) using unblessed bowl with pure water on flamewall---------------------------------TODO 5) using blessed bowl with plain water on flamewall-----------------------------------TODO 6) using unblessed bowl with plain water on flamewall--------------------------------TODO 7)Use Magical Fire Pass on flamewall------------------------------------------------TODO
using cut reed plant on shallow water: 1)with unblessed bowl in inventory(Stage 0)--------------------------------------- TODO 2)with blessed bowl in inventory(Stage 1)---------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/sLrtVwwy 3)using cut reed on shallow water with blessed bowl when it looks disgusting(Stage 2)------ TODO 4)using cut reed on shallow water with unblessed bowl when its disgusting----------------- TODO
Smashing pieces of boulder: 1)Success/Fail------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/TRsfzCzF 3)certain level to mine---------- SendMessage("You need a mining ability of atleast 52 to affect these boulders.");
Heavy metal gate: 1) look--------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qxVvgV09 2) push------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/JRdXCW5b 3)failing to push open------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/DW37bR1M
Jump Ruined wall: 1)success/fail (Missing 1 option)------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/f6qVReTz
searching Ancient wall: 1)with no runes in it--------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/PLFbmd5A 2) with some runes added---------------------------------------------------------- TODO 3) with all runes added------------------------------------------------------------- TODO
Ancient Wall: 1)adding runes to it---------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/b0w2eV2A 2)adding final rune to wall --------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/0MBfhC6n 3)putting runes in wrong order---------------------------------------------------- TODO
Use Ancient Wall: 2)with some runes added to it------------------------------------------------------- TODO 3)with all runes added to it----------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/jJGv3WKg 4)Using the Ancient wall to go back (from pool end)------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/y2VmGtVS
Using Gems on Each carved rock (gems assigned to each pool): 1)if gem doesn't match the pool---------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/indrY0ur 2)Adding individual gems to the pool------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/4REUZfaY 9)When final gem is placed on rock then-------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/pRgMsTLz (Note: read quest notes for gems assigned to the rocks)
Dark metal gate: 1)Search---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/6kHp7yXr 2)Open----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/dyK9GTGE 3)Exiting Dark metal gate from inside it where the rope/barrels are:------------------------ http://pastebin.com/UzTXtRcg
smashing Strange barrels: 1)unable to smash------------------------------------------ SendMessage("You were unable to smash this barrel open."); 2)able to smash--------------------------------------------- SendMessage("You smash the barrel open."); 3)whats in the barrels------------------------(See quest notes)
use: "rope down into darkness": 1) before u drink Gujuo potion----------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/J2GLCfDB 2) after u drink Gujuo potion----------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/shzH1Ceg 3) Losing concentration when you go down rope--------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/5WiEkB2b
Climbing rock hewn stairs: 1)Success------------------------------------------------------------------- SendMessage("You climb down the steps."); 2)Fail---------------------------------------------------------------------- SendMessage("You slip and fall...");
Balance rocky walkway: 1)Success--------------------------------------------------------------- SendMessage("You manage to keep your balance."); 2)if u click on same walkway------------------------------------------- SendMessage("You're standing there already!"); 3)Fail----------- SendMessage("You slip and fall..."); SendMessage("...but you luckily avoid any damage.");
Ancient Lava Furnace: 1)Search--------------------------------------------------------- SendMessage("This is an ancient looking furnace."); 2)Looking Ancient Lava furnace------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/paeAELUK 3)Using individual crystal fragments: on Ancient lava furnace------------------ http://pastebin.com/N81sEDWK 4)When final crystal is placed------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/7Ax1PJZV
Ancient Wooden doors: 1)Attempting to open ancient wooden doors---------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/gsKFb1sL 2)picklocking Ancient wooden doors success/fail------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/FrLxv9iX 3)exiting ancient doors from the inside:--------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/27GSiRZp
:::::more(continued) on pastebin link::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: http://pastebin.com/FixG0HnN
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Quest Notes: http://pastebin.com/WDzXFsWg
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Missing Information: http://pastebin.com/1e1JrT0b ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Reward: 4 quest points, and 10k xp in your choice of 4 skills
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Any Questions feel free to ask them....
